p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: We strive for both academic and professional excellence and are committed to a comprehensive education in all aspects of imaging-education through instruction and experience, using traditional workstation teaching and didactic and innovative teaching methods such as simulation and flipped classrooms. We perform more than 600,000 radiologic exams in total annually at our educational sites. All faculty are fellowship-trained with all subspecialties represented.
